Noun: act of improving by expanding or enlarging or refining
a process in which something passes by degrees to a different stage (especially a more advanced or mature stag)
a recent event that has some relevance for the present situation
the act of making some area of land or water more profitable or productive or useful
a district that has been developed to serve some purpose
a state in which things are improving; the result of developing (as in the early part of a game of ches)
processing a photosensitive material in order to make an image visible
